page.title: 19Clubs in Northill
page.content: Although the Women's Institute faded out 8 or 9 years ago, many other local clubs & societies flourish & good use is made of the excellent facilities in the Village Hall. Most groups draw members from the adjacent village of Ickwell & organisations such as{Play- {group, Mothers and Toddlers}and the {Recorder Society}are based there. The{Mothers' Union, Bellringers}and {Nomads}(youth club) are closely linked with the Church, whilst{Thursday Club and{Social Circle}meet monthly in members' homes for entertainment and discussion, and to raise money for local causes. There is a thriving {Drama Group,}and the{British Legion, {Brownies, Parent-Teacher Association, and{Conservative Association}are all well supported. The{Badminton Club} plays twice weekly, and the{N'Amblers follow the local footpaths each month.
